reviews.review: Oyun 2012 yılında çıkmasına rağmen günümüzde hala en çok oynanan oyunlar arasında.
one of the best even hackers are infested
Игра хорошая, но очень много читеров с прайм-статусом играть ну куда проще чем бес прайм-статуса
Dude, it's CS. You literally can't go wrong with this franchise. Literally every other FPS game will come and go, but CS will endure for eternity.

Cheaters or throwers literally every game, cheaters can get prime accounts for $5 and they arent getting IP banned. Hit Reg is still shit, cant headshot people when i see the bullets going through their head. servers are dying and it takes 20+ min to queue into a comp to just play with shitters. Game is A1 clearly, 8 years later and its still in the trash.
Единственный тактический шутер, где шансов победить больше, если 9 игроков в муте.
it takes to long to download
it's my 7th account and it still fucking sucks
Oyunda ki hileler engellenmediği sürece oynanmaz. Oyunun  bedava olması hilecileri arttırıyor ve sürekli hileyle oynuyolar insanları sinirlerini bozmaktan başka bir işe yaramayan oyun
this is an okay game, trust factor is the only issue i found

Lets just say this game will really show you what of a useless and horrible human being you are.

9/10

Too little way too late. Still has rampant hacking and it's been years. Some weapons are just too op and it's been years. It's a skin gambling sim, not a game. Valve made that decision years ago, and only just now are trying touch things up after years of borderline inactivity. Once a great developer, just an empty husk of has-beens. Nearly all the developer and design talent has left. Too many better options these days, and frankly... If you only bother cleaning up because you have similar competition coming in to take your playerbase, you don't deserve your playerbase.

Good ole' CS ... I started playing recently after a 10 year break.
For every 3 out of 4 matched you will meet either wall hackers or smurfs. This is ridiculous how many players do this. Often toggling is used in an attempt to hide it.... Valve should really make 2 kind of accounts. 1 that costs a pretty penny and 1 free because the Overwatch and reporting initiative is not nearly enough.

Lo que más me ha gustado del juego es la variedad de armas,la alta exactitud de los hit boxes repartidos por el cuerpo de cada personaje es  muy precisa. Es un videojuego muy competitivo y podrá sacarte varias horas de diversión. Disfrutalo que ahora esta gratis!
